messages.subject: BRS: Live Event DVD torrent
messages.msgSnippet: It will probably never reach our shores... But I thought I d share this for those who are interested. Last June or July, BRS got some live-action DVD released.
messages.messageBody:
It will probably never reach our shores... But I thought I'd share
this for those who are interested. Last June or July, BRS got some
live-action DVD released. There were a lot of notable seiyuus who
appeared and some sort of stage play. It's not anime but a recording
of that live event.

http://www.crosswithyou.net/bt/

Look for this: Bakumatsu Renka Shinsengumi Live Event
(1599 MB - Seiyuu event featuring Konishi Katsuyuki, Morikubo
Shoutarou, Sakurai Takahiro, Morita Masakazu, Miki Shinichirou and
Matsuno Taiki.)
